"Cortes": "Next time you want to gain some experience, come see me."
"OHOHO! Those eyes... haven't yet lost any of their ambition."
"Very well! I shall give you another task. One to yet further broaden your horizons."
"Ah, you seem to be preoccupied with a mission. When you have adequate time, come and see me again."
"Experience everything. Trying comes at no cost."
"Mm. Perhaps I was mistaken, then. Ah well, we all have those days."
"Now, keep doing that until even your body has memorized it."
